strings.Value: "Your Highness! If you left the palace alive, you must be the new {mf|King|Queen} of {g|Pitax}Pitax{/g}. As victor, you deserve a much more stately greeting, but I'm afraid we'll have to postpone the festivities. Your new subjects are in urgent need of help!"
"Professor Eobald? What are you doing here? It's dangerous for you here!"
"You know how restless Linzi is. She followed you all the way to {g|Pitax}Pitax{/g}. And now she and many others are in serious danger!"
"I came because I was worried about you... But I'm not the one who's in danger right now."
"There are riots in the city. A crowd has gathered around the {g|Academy of Grand Arts}Academy of Grand Arts{/g} â€” and they're out for blood! I beg you, you must interfere before it's too late!"
